<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ring of Minor Arcana](/Equipment.aspx?ID=478)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Fall of Plaguestone</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 58</row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This rose-gold ring is adorned in the center by a somewhat ominous-looking horned skull. This ring gives you the power to cast the following innate arcane cantrips any number of times each day: [detect magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [mage hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), and [prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229). Each is cast as a 1st-level spell. If you are an arcane spellcaster, these can instead be heightened to the level of your cantrips.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
